name: Virus Evolution - Merge & Create Mutant Diseases
name_original: Virus Evolution - Merge & Create Mutant Diseases
description:
Virus can’t technically be called lifeforms, and they sorely resent this fact!

Merge many different virus strains to create new mutant microscopic threats that will invariably end up wiping out all life in the universe…

Except for themselves, because they’re not “life.”

Not feeling so alive now, are we?

VIRAL FEATURES

👾Pantheon: a new place for supreme beings to look down on us mortals and laugh at our misery
👾Impostors: watch out for impostors trying to steal the spotlight from the viruses.

HOW TO PLAY

👾Drag and drop similar viruses to create new sneaky creatures
👾Use virus eggs to earn coins, buy new creatures and make even more money
👾Alternatively, fiercely tap a virus to make coins pop from their eggs

HIGHLIGHTS

👾Different stages and many virus species to discover
👾A mind-blowing story with virulent twists!
👾The unexpected mix of creature evolution dynamics and incremental clicker games
👾Doodle-like illustrations
👾Open-ended gameplay: enjoy the freedom!
👾No viruses were harmed in the making of this game, only developers

Let’s make this game go viral, you guys!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
